name: IpRegOptions
brief:
Option registration, validation, and documentation system

Provides infrastructure for declaring algorithm options with:
- Type information (OT_Number, OT_Integer, OT_String)
- Valid ranges (bounds for numerics, allowed values for strings)
- Default values
- Documentation strings for help generation
- Categories for organizing options in documentation

RegisteredOptions aggregates all RegisteredOption instances and
provides lookup, validation, and documentation generation.

Each Ipopt component registers its options in RegisterAllOptions()
during initialization.
